Stress, why it helps to relieve of it
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Raising Methods: Stress, why it helps to relieve of it
By Blueskullnbonez on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 12:23 pm:

While I was training my monster, I notice something. During training, he keeps on failing when full of energy and never getting greats. It was so till I saved b4 venturing. After the venture, the monster was doing the same: badly. I loaded, and picked up shells that gave: 2 very relieved of stress, 1 far less relieved of stress (i never heard of that), 1 less stressed. Then during training, he had greats on full of energy and never failed when tired. If you all knew this, then how dumb of me. I thought stress reduce life only.

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 05:01 pm:

i've noticed the same thing, blueskull. if i get a stress-reducing item at a venture, it seems i have a much greater chance of getting a great in the next month...in fact, i just about count on it.

By Khift on Sunday, March 10, 2002 - 07:49 am:

And this would help people realize the usefullness of Beaming Rocks as well. Before now I just thought that they weren't very useful at all. I guess I was wrong.

By torey_luvullo on Sunday, March 10, 2002 - 09:20 am:

in his thread about maxing out his suzurin, the campster confirms this phenomenon as well.
